name: holiday bell ornament
notes:
holiday bell features a classic bell shape, adorned with a delicate ruffled border.

holiday bell crochet along video:
right hand wreath: https://youtu.be/ys7ip15jxgo
left hand wreath: https://youtu.be/rqlr7-58pow

beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques:
-magic circle 
-single crochet (sc)
-single crochet increase (inc)
-half double crochet (hdc)
-chain (ch)
-fastening off 

the pattern is written in u.s. crochet terms, complete with clear instructions and video tutorialÂ to help you along the way. holiday bell is crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds. i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round. holiday bell is crocheted in worsted weight yarn and is approximately 2.5 inches tall.  be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used. gauge is not particularly important, just be consistent with the tension you are using. and most importantly, have fun!

supplies needed for this pattern:
worsted weight yarn - i do not recommend bulky/extra bulky weight yarn for this pattern
e(3.5mm) crochet hook
yarn/darning needle
scissors
locking stitch markers
gold floss (optional)
 20mm jingle bell
